Robert F. Wagner Graduate School of Public Service Courses
Robert F. Wagner Graduate School of Public Service Courses

Website containing course information for Robert F. Wagner Graduate School of Public Service. It includes course highlights, courses across NYU that can be taken as pre-approved electives, courses abroad, capstone information, independent study, non-Wagner student enrollment in Wagner courses, program requirement checklists, course evaluations, skills workshops, and undergraduate and graduate course schedules by semester. Each semester since Fall 2017 the page featured course highlights, linking to descriptions of new courses, returning courses not taught the previous year, courses that require application, courses with intensive format, saturday courses, courses with new titles, and courses with new instructors.
